column4: Man.. I wish I had known more about the way the filesystem in Linux works before I had set up my partitions
I gave /home 10 gigs and / only 5, but all of the packages go into /!!
But I only have 1.8GB left on / .
What's that do, exactly..?  will it break anything?
it will clean the downloaded packages
yes, you don't need them after being installed
look at a df -h before and after
oo.  I didn't know about df.  that's a fun command
Is it a bad sign if I experience a mote of nerdy joy every time I discover a new bash command?
on the right way you are, young padawan
